mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.regdt, B.unm AS writerNm, B.profileimg FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser ORDER BY iboard DESC;
SELECT A.ctnt, A.title, A.regdt, A.iuser, A.iboard, B.unm AS writerNm FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_cmt ( iboard, iuser, cmt ) VALUES (#{iboard}, #{iuser}, #{cmt} )
